title: On Quantum Modularity for Geometric 3-Manifolds
summary: The quantum modularity conjecture, first introduced by Don Zagier, is a general statement about a relation between $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ quantum invariants of links and 3-manifolds at roots of unity related by a modular transformation. In this note we formulate a strong version of the conjecture for Witten--Reshetikhin--Turaev invariants of closed geometric, not necessarily hyperbolic, 3-manifolds. This version in particular involves a geometrically distinguished $SL(2,\mathbb{C})$ flat connection (a generalization of the standard hyperbolic flat connection to other Thurston geometries) and has a statement about the integrality of coefficients appearing in the modular transformation formula. We prove that the conjecture holds for Brieskorn homology spheres and some other examples. We also comment on how the conjecture relates to a formal realization of the $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ quantum invariant at a general root of unity as a path integral in analytically continued $SU(2)$ Chern--Simons theory with a rational level.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了量子模性猜想的强化版本，针对闭几何3-流形的Witten-Reshetikhin-Turaev不变量，涉及几何上可区分的SL(2,C)平坦联络，并证明了该猜想对Brieskorn同调球面等例子的成立。
AI.motivation: Don Zagier提出的量子模性猜想描述了$\mathfrak{sl}_2$量子不变量在单位根处的模变换关系。作者旨在为闭几何3-流形（不一定是双曲的）的WRT不变量构建一个强化版本，该版本包含几何上可区分的平坦联络，并涉及模变换公式中系数的整性。
AI.method: 作者首先为闭几何3-流形（包括非双曲情况）的WRT不变量构建了量子模性猜想的强化版本。该版本涉及几何上可区分的SL(2,C)平坦联络（将标准双曲平坦联络推广到其他Thurston几何）。然后通过具体例子验证猜想，特别是证明了Brieskorn同调球面满足该猜想。
AI.result: 证明了量子模性猜想的强化版本对Brieskorn同调球面成立，并验证了其他一些例子。同时讨论了该猜想如何将$\mathfrak{sl}_2$量子不变量在一般单位根处实现为有理水平SU(2)Chern-Simons理论中的路径积分。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建并验证了量子模性猜想的强化版本，该版本适用于更广泛的几何3-流形，为理解量子不变量与几何结构之间的深层联系提供了新视角，并建立了与Chern-Simons理论路径积分形式化的联系。

title: Exceptional embeddings of $N=2$ minimal models
summary: Vafa and Warner observed that the Landau-Ginzburg model associated to the potential $E_6$ (resp. $E_8$) is a product of two other models, associated to the potentials $A_2$ and $ A_3$ (resp. $A_2 $ and $ A_4$). We translate this along the Landau-Ginzburg / Conformal Field Theory correspondence to a conjecture about the unitary minimal quotients $M_d$ of the $N=2$ superconformal algebra of central charge $c_d=3-\frac{6}{d}$: there should be a conformal embedding $M_{12}\hookrightarrow M_{3} \otimes M_4$ (resp. $M_{30}\hookrightarrow M_{3} \otimes M_5$) that exhibits the product as Ostrik's $E_6$ (resp. $E_8$) algebra in the $\mathrm{Rep}(su(2)_{10})$ (resp. $\mathrm{Rep}(su(2)_{28})$) factor of the NS-sector of $\mathrm{Rep}(M_{12})$ (resp. $\mathrm{Rep}(M_{30})$). We motivate, formulate, and prove this conjecture.

AI.tldr: 该论文将Vafa和Warner关于Landau-Ginzburg模型乘积结构的观察，通过Landau-Ginzburg/共形场论对应，转化为关于N=2超共形代数最小商M_d的共形嵌入猜想，并进行了证明。
AI.motivation: Vafa和Warner观察到E_6和E_8势能的Landau-Ginzburg模型可以分解为其他模型的乘积。作者希望将这一观察通过Landau-Ginzburg/共形场论对应，转化为关于N=2超共形代数最小商M_d的数学猜想。
AI.method: 通过Landau-Ginzburg/共形场论对应，将物理观察转化为数学猜想：存在共形嵌入M_12→M_3⊗M_4和M_30→M_3⊗M_5，这些嵌入在相应的表示范畴中展现出E_6和E_8代数结构。
AI.result: 作者成功证明了这个猜想：确实存在所描述的共形嵌入，这些嵌入在NS扇区的表示范畴中展现出Ostrik的E_6和E_8代数结构。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了Landau-Ginzburg模型乘积结构与N=2超共形代数最小商之间共形嵌入的精确对应关系，为理解这些数学结构之间的联系提供了新的视角。

title: Complete Structural Analysis of $q$-Heisenberg Algebras: Homology, Rigidity, Automorphisms, and Deformations
summary: This paper establishes several fundamental structural properties of the $q$-Heisenberg algebra $\mathfrak{h}_n(q)$, a quantum deformation of the classical Heisenberg algebra. We first prove that when $q$ is not a root of unity, the global homological dimension of $\mathfrak{h}_n(q)$ is exactly $3n$, while it becomes infinite when $q$ is a root of unity. We then demonstrate the rigidity of its iterated Ore extension structure, showing that any such presentation is essentially unique up to permutation and scaling of variables. The graded automorphism group is completely determined to be isomorphic to $(\mathbb{C}^*)^{2n} \rtimes S_n$. Furthermore, $\mathfrak{h}_n(q)$ is shown to possess a universal deformation property as the canonical PBW-preserving deformation of the classical Heisenberg algebra $\mathfrak{h}_n(1)$. We compute its Hilbert series as $(1-t)^{-3n}$, confirming polynomial growth of degree $3n$, and establish that its Gelfand--Kirillov dimension coincides with its classical Krull dimension. These results are extended to a generalized multi-parameter version $\mathfrak{H}_n(\mathbf{Q})$, and illustrated through detailed examples and applications in representation theory and deformation quantization.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了q-Heisenberg代数的基本结构性质，包括同调维数、刚性结构、自同构群、变形性质、Hilbert级数等，并将结果推广到多参数版本。
AI.motivation: 研究q-Heisenberg代数的基本结构性质，这是经典Heisenberg代数的量子变形，在表示理论和变形量子化中有重要应用。
AI.method: 通过代数结构分析，证明同调维数、刚性性质、自同构群结构、变形性质等，计算Hilbert级数，并推广到多参数版本。
AI.result: 当q不是单位根时，全局同调维数为3n；当q是单位根时无限。证明了Ore扩张结构的刚性，自同构群为(C*)^{2n}⋊S_n，具有通用变形性质，Hilbert级数为(1-t)^{-3n}，GK维数与经典Krull维数一致。
AI.conclusion: q-Heisenberg代数具有丰富的结构性质，包括确定的同调维数、刚性结构、明确的自同构群、通用变形特性等，这些结果可推广到多参数版本，在表示理论和变形量子化中有重要应用。

title: The von Neumann algebraic quantum group $\mathrm{SU}_q(1,1)\rtimes \mathbb{Z}_2$ and the DSSYK model
summary: The double-scaling limit of the SYK (DSSYK) model is known to possess an underlying $\mathcal{U}_q(\mathfrak{su}(1,1))$ quantum group symmetry. In this paper, we provide, for the first time, a von Neumann algebraic quantum group-theoretical description of the degrees of freedom and the dynamics of the DSSYK model. In particular, we construct the operator-algebraic quantum Gauss decomposition for the von Neumann algebraic quantum group $\mathrm{SU}_q(1,1)\rtimes \mathbb{Z}_2$, i.e. the $q$-deformation of the normaliser of $\mathrm{SU}(1,1)$ in $\mathrm{SL}(2,\mathbb{C})$, and derive the Casimir action on its quantum homogeneous spaces. We then show that the dynamics on quantum AdS$_{2,q}$ space reduces to that of the DSSYK model. Furthermore, we argue that the extension of the global symmetry group to its normaliser is not only necessary for a consistent definition of the locally compact quantum group, but that, moreover, the reduction to the DSSYK model works exclusively at the level of the normaliser. The von Neumann algebraic description is shown to give a natural restriction on the allowed quantised coordinates, elegantly ensuring length positivity and non-negative integer chord numbers. Lastly, we make remarks on the correlation function related to the strange series representation, which is argued to interpolate between the AdS and dS regions of our $q$-homogeneous space.

AI.tldr: 该论文首次为DSSYK模型提供了冯·诺依曼代数量子群理论描述，构建了SU_q(1,1)⋊ℤ₂的算子代数量子高斯分解，并证明量子AdS_{2,q}空间上的动力学约化为DSSYK模型。
AI.motivation: DSSYK模型的双标度极限已知具有潜在的𝒰_q(𝔰𝔲(1,1))量子群对称性，但缺乏系统的冯·诺依曼代数量子群理论描述。需要构建算子代数框架来理解模型的自由度和动力学。
AI.method: 构建了冯·诺依曼代数量子群SU_q(1,1)⋊ℤ₂的算子代数量子高斯分解，推导了其量子齐次空间上的Casimir作用，并证明量子AdS_{2,q}空间动力学约化为DSSYK模型。
AI.result: 成功建立了DSSYK模型的冯·诺依曼代数量子群描述，证明了全局对称群扩展到其正规化子的必要性，冯·诺依曼代数描述自然限制了允许的量子化坐标，确保了长度正性和非负整数弦数。
AI.conclusion: 该工作首次为DSSYK模型提供了完整的冯·诺依曼代数量子群理论框架，揭示了模型与量子AdS_{2,q}空间的深刻联系，并讨论了相关函数在AdS和dS区域间的插值性质。

title: Lifting in a non semisimple world
summary: This is a contribution to the problem of classifying all deformations - a. k. a. liftings - of the bosonization of a Nichols algebra $\mathfrak{B}(V)$ over a cosemisimple and non-semisimple Hopf algebra $H$. Such a situation arises when the underlying field has positive characteristic or when $H$ is infinite-dimensional. Given an $H$-module $M$ that is an extension of $V$ by $H$, we first introduce an algebra $T(V)\#_MH$ which generalizes the usual bosonization $T(V)\#H$. Indeed, these two objects coincide when $M$ is a trivial extension. We provide necessary conditions for $T(V)\#_MH$ to be a Hopf algebra and a cocycle deformation of $T(V)\#H$. These conditions appear particularly natural when $H$ is a group algebra. We then prove that every lifting is a quotient of $T(V)\#_MH$ for some extension $M$. Echoing Archimedes, $T(V)\#_MH$ stands as a fulcrum over which we can pivot to lift the relations of the Nichols algebra. From this point, one can replicate the strategy proposed by Andruskiewitsch, Angiono, Garcia I., Masuoka and the second author to show that every lifting is a cocycle deformation of $\mathfrak{B}(V)\#H$. We illustrate this idea with two examples of different nature. We classify all pointed liftings of the Fomin-Kirillov algebra $\mathcal{FK}_3$ in characteristic $2$, and prove they are all cocycle deformations one another. We also prove that the Jordanian enveloping algebra of $\mathfrak{sl}(2)$ defined by Andruskiewitsch, Angiono and Heckenberger is a cocycle deformation of the bosonization of the Jordan plane over the infinite cyclic group.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了在余半单但非半单Hopf代数上Nichols代数的玻色化形变分类问题，提出了推广的玻色化构造T(V)#_MH，证明了所有提升都是该构造的商，且都是余循环形变。
AI.motivation: 研究在特征为正或Hopf代数无限维情况下，Nichols代数玻色化的形变分类问题。这种情形出现在基础域有正特征或Hopf代数无限维时，需要处理余半单但非半单的Hopf代数。
AI.method: 首先引入推广的玻色化代数T(V)#_MH，它推广了通常的玻色化T(V)#H。当M是平凡扩张时两者一致。给出T(V)#_MH成为Hopf代数和T(V)#H的余循环形变的必要条件。证明每个提升都是某个扩张M对应的T(V)#_MH的商。
AI.result: 证明了所有提升都是T(V)#_MH的商，且都是玻色化𝔅(V)#H的余循环形变。通过两个例子验证：在特征2下分类了Fomin-Kirillov代数ℱ𝒦₃的所有点状提升，证明它们互为余循环形变；证明了Andruskiewitsch等人定义的𝔰𝔩(2)的Jordanian包络代数是无限循环群上Jordan平面玻色化的余循环形变。
AI.conclusion: 论文为Nichols代数玻色化的形变分类提供了系统框架，通过推广的玻色化构造T(V)#_MH作为"支点"，可以提升Nichols代数的关系，证明所有提升都是余循环形变，统一处理了特征为正和无限维Hopf代数的情况。

title: Quasi racks, quasi bijective and quasi non-degenerate set-theoretic solutions of the Yang-Baxter equation
summary: This work initiates a systematic study of the class of quasi bijective and quasi non-degenerate solutions to the set-theoretic Yang-Baxter equation. The motivation stems from the observation that solutions that arise from dual weak braces belong to these classes. The notions of quasi rack and derived solution are introduced and examined, extending the classical definitions. Additionally, a family of quasi left non-degenerate solutions is described in terms of quasi racks and g-twists, analogous to the left non-degenerate case. Furthermore, we completely characterize a class of quasi racks that are Plonka sum of racks.

AI.tldr: 该论文系统研究了集合论杨-巴克斯特方程的拟双射和拟非退化解类，扩展了经典定义，引入了拟rack和派生解的概念，并描述了拟左非退化解的结构。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于观察到从对偶弱brace产生的解属于这些类，需要对这些解类进行系统研究以扩展经典理论。
AI.method: 引入了拟rack和派生解的概念，扩展了经典定义；描述了拟左非退化解在拟rack和g-扭曲下的结构；完全刻画了作为rack的Plonka和的拟rack类。
AI.result: 建立了拟双射和拟非退化解的系统理论框架；提供了拟左非退化解的结构描述；完全分类了作为rack的Plonka和的拟rack类。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为集合论杨-巴克斯特方程的拟双射和拟非退化解类提供了系统研究框架，扩展了经典理论，建立了与对偶弱brace的联系，并为相关结构提供了完整分类。

title: A new characterization of Kac-type discrete quantum groups
summary: We obtain two related characterizations of discrete quantum groups and discrete quantum groups of Kac type as allegorical group objects in the symmetric monoidal dagger category of quantum sets and relations, of interest to quantum predicate logic and quantum information theory. Specifically, we characterize discrete quantum groups by the existence of an inversion relation and discrete quantum groups of Kac type by the existence of an inversion function. This confirms a conjectured description of discrete quantum groups of Kac type and brings them within the purview of category-internal universal algebra.

AI.tldr: 该论文在量子集合与关系的对称幺半dagger范畴中，将离散量子群和Kac型离散量子群刻画为寓言群对象，为量子谓词逻辑和量子信息理论提供了新的理论框架。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是将离散量子群和Kac型离散量子群纳入范畴内部通用代数的范畴，为量子谓词逻辑和量子信息理论提供更系统的数学基础。
AI.method: 在量子集合与关系的对称幺半dagger范畴中，通过引入反演关系和反演函数的概念，分别刻画离散量子群和Kac型离散量子群作为寓言群对象。
AI.result: 成功获得了离散量子群的两个相关刻画：通过存在反演关系来刻画一般离散量子群，通过存在反演函数来刻画Kac型离散量子群，证实了关于Kac型离散量子群的猜想描述。
AI.conclusion: 该研究将离散量子群和Kac型离散量子群纳入范畴内部通用代数的研究范围，为量子谓词逻辑和量子信息理论提供了新的数学工具和理论框架。

title: Wild genus-zero quantum de Rham spaces
comment: v3: quick correction of typo in abstract, 76 pp.; comments welcome!
summary: The wild de Rham spaces parameterize isomorphism classes of (stable) meromorphic connections, defined on principal bundles over wild Riemann surfaces. Working on the Riemann sphere, we will deformation-quantize the standard open part of de Rham spaces, which corresponds to the moduli of linear partial differential equations with meromorphic coefficients. We treat the general (typically nongeneric) untwisted/unramified case with semisimple formal residue, for any polar divisor and reductive structure group, without using parabolic/parahoric structures on the trivial bundle. The main ingredients are: (i) constructing the quantum Hamiltonian reduction of a (tensor) product of quantized coadjoint orbits in dual truncated-current Lie algebras, involving the corresponding category-O Verma modules; and (ii) establishing sufficient conditions on the coadjoint orbits, so that generically all meromorphic connections are stable, and the (semiclassical) moment map for the gauge-group action is faithfully flat.

AI.tldr: 该论文对黎曼球面上的野生de Rham空间进行变形量子化，处理具有半单形式残差的无扭曲/无分支情况，不依赖于抛物/抛物子群结构。
AI.motivation: 野生de Rham空间参数化野生黎曼曲面上主丛的稳定亚纯联络同构类。研究目标是变形量子化de Rham空间的标准开子集，该子集对应于具有亚纯系数的线性偏微分方程的模空间。
AI.method: 主要方法包括：(i) 在截断流李代数的对偶余伴随轨道上构造量子哈密顿约化，涉及相应的范畴O Verma模；(ii) 建立余伴随轨道的充分条件，确保一般情形下所有亚纯联络都是稳定的，且规范群作用的（半经典）矩映射是忠实平坦的。
AI.result: 成功实现了对野生de Rham空间标准开子集的变形量子化，处理了任意极除子和约化结构群的一般非泛型情况，无需在平凡丛上使用抛物/抛物子群结构。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为野生黎曼球面上具有亚纯系数的线性偏微分方程模空间提供了系统的量子化框架，建立了余伴随轨道稳定性条件与规范群作用矩映射性质之间的重要联系。
